Hong Ye Ji

Korean: 홍예지

Height:

Introduction

Hong Ye Ji is a South Korean actress under Big Whale Entertainment. She was first known for being one of the participants of the survival show Produce 48, where she represented CNC School. She was eliminated in episode 5 after ranking 75th place. Eventually, she made her acting debut and rose to stardom after starring in the movie "On My Way Home."

In 2023, Hong Yeji was cast in her first drama "Fantasy Sonata," starring alongside Park Jihoon.
